author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Place the pepper half onto a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Place into the oven and roast for ten minutes. Season with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper. In a bowl mix together the remaining ingredients and use to stuff the pepper. Return the pepper to the oven and cook for a further ten minutes and serve.
ingredients: ½ red pepper, stalk intact, seeds removed,  1 tbsp olive oil,  sea salt and freshly ground black pepper,  55g/2oz cooked basmati rice,  25g/1oz blue cheese,  1 spring onion, finely sliced,  1 tbsp double cream,  ½ tsp chopped fresh sage,  ½ tsp chopped fresh parsley
